diag.dialogue: Hey, uh. Can you point me to the nearest city...?
You must be new here... This is the Crossroads of Asteria
In simpler terms, you are in this closed off space because I am here.
I'm not sure I understand
Ugh. It is so difficult to explain to new Champions.
Asteria itself determines where Champions go. We Asteria-born are permitted to go where we please.
That sounds very inconvient can I come with you to the next city then?
Hmm a brand new Champion all to myself? The offer is tempting but I have business here.
You're free to explore the area but not before I give you a little parting gift
I'll give you a special piercing that will let my fellow merchants know you are at least interesting.
And depending on how much you entertain us you may yet earn more... gifts
Gifts like what?
For now? Nothing, we are at the Crossroads and the rest of the area is not drawn for us yet.
But enough talk, remove your clothe-
Ah you are naked already. Tempting but I'll keep to what I promised for now

diag.narration: With surprising agility, the snake merchant quickly slithers up to your naked form and lowers himself to meet your eye level
Before you can react however, he begins licking your nipple very suddenly.

diag.dialogue: HUH!?
Relax~ No need to tense up boy. Although I'll admit its cute.
AH what are you doing?
Preparing you for a nipple piercing of course. It is the most visible of piercings.
So, is a face piercing!
You have enough as it is and you want more?
I'm fine with more face piercings!
Be thankful of my gift boy. Getting one is more difficult than you think.
An Orc Champion is one of many interesting things I'm sure we'll learn about you
F-Fine then.
For an Orc you are so adorable and much more lenient. I can't wait to see how Asteria corrupts you
For an Orc? How are Orc's usua-

diag.narration: In the slight moment of your distraction, the snake merchant clamps down on you nipple and you feel a sharp pain that makes you wince
Quickly you back off from the Merchant.

diag.dialogue: It is done boy.
Wha-

diag.narration: As you look down you notice you have a small ornament hanging from your nipple

diag.dialogue: You have many piercings but you are surprised like its your first one?
I was expecting a clip-on piercing not a snake stapler!
Keep in touch boy. I'll be here for a while.
Also a friendly advice. I've been getting an uneasy sense near the bushes nearby
Since I've planned to invest in you take great caution near them. I would hate to have to look for you
Invest? I thought this was a gift?

diag.narration: Quickly as you've said that a smile spreads across the merchant's face

diag.dialogue: It is. But its more of a reminder to all my other merchant brothers. That I found you first.
Ugh...
Happy Exploring!
